roleset.name: stir up
roleset.note: ROUSE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville based on BROWN.. Member of VNcls force-59. (from rouse.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The first rattle of the machine guns , at 7:10 in the evening , roused aroundme the varied voices and faces of fear .
example.arg: The first rattle of the machine guns
the varied voices and faces of fear
